-- svca/svca.go --
package svca

import "context"

//encore:api public
func Foo(ctx context.Context) error { return nil }

//encore:trace type=internal
func SomeInternal(ctx context.Context) error { return nil }

//encore:trace type=request_handler
func SomeRequestHandler(ctx context.Context) error { return nil }

//encore:trace type=call
func SomeCall(ctx context.Context) error { return nil }

//encore:trace type=producer
func SomeProducer(ctx context.Context) error { return nil }

//encore:trace type=consumer
func SomeConsumer(ctx context.Context) error { return nil }

-- want:svca/svca.go --
